name: Small World Demo
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move and jump.

Use the spacebar to move to the next level when the level is complete (the number in the top-left corner is the number of enemies passed, and the number below it is the number of enemies in total)

Click the game area after pressing "Run game" to start the game.

The "Effect" button toggles dancing meteors.

Code: Cosmo Brain

Music: Cosmo Brain

Art: Celestial Tater
